sentences.en: A vibrating membrane in the ear helps to convey sounds to the brain.
sentences.cn: 耳膜的振动帮助声音传送到大脑.

sentences.en: Ads convey the message that thin is beautiful.
sentences.cn: 广告传递的信息是: 瘦就是美。

sentences.en: All this information can be conveyed in a simple diagram.
sentences.cn: 所有这些信息可以通过一张简单的图表来表示。

sentences.en: Colours like red convey a sense of energy and strength.
sentences.cn: 红色之类的颜色可给人以充满活力与力量的感觉。

sentences.en: Convey my congratulations to her.
sentences.cn: 请代我向她表示祝贺.

sentences.en: Destroyers escorted a convey of merchant ships.
sentences.cn: 驱逐舰护送一支商船队.

sentences.en: Don't forget to convey my regards when you see him.
sentences.cn: 你去见着他,别忘了给我捎个好儿.

sentences.en: He hammered home the points he wanted to convey.
sentences.cn: 他把所要传达的重点讲得非常透彻.

sentences.en: He tried to convey how he felt.
sentences.cn: 他试图表达他的感受.

sentences.en: He was sent to convey a message to the UN Secretary General.
sentences.cn: 他被派去向联合国秘书长传达一条信息。

sentences.en: I can't convey my feelings in words.
sentences.cn: 我无法用言语来表达我的情感.

sentences.en: In every one of her pictures she conveys a sense of immediacy.
sentences.cn: 她的每一张画都有一种直观性。

sentences.en: It is difficult to convey the sheer complexity of the situation.
sentences.cn: 很难说清楚形势究竟有多复杂.

sentences.en: My letter will convey some idea of my mode of life.
sentences.cn: 我的信将使你了解到一些我的生活方式.

sentences.en: Please convey my gratitude to her.
sentences.cn: 请向她转达我的谢意.

sentences.en: She realized that Johnson was trying to convey to her that he was lonely.
sentences.cn: 她意识到约翰逊是在尽力向她表达他的寂寞.

sentences.en: The railway company extended a branch line to Brightlingsea to convey fish direct to Billingsgate.
sentences.cn: 铁路公司修建了一条通往布赖特灵西的支线，以便直接将鱼运送到比林斯门。

sentences.en: The speed at which we talk can also convey a great deal.
sentences.cn: 我们的语速同样能传达许多信息。

sentences.en: The words fail to convey the meaning.
sentences.cn: 词不达意.

sentences.en: When I returned home, I tried to convey the wonder of this machine to my husband.
sentences.cn: 回到家之后，我设法让我丈夫知道这台机器的神奇之处。

sentences.en: Your luggage will be conveyed to the hotel by taxi.
sentences.cn: 你的行李将由出租车送到酒店。
